TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
I thought to give it a hint of Asia - y'know with cats and all - sorry if that's not what you wanted

 

WAITER, im pretty sure Putin and Trump are not supposed to be dancing on the surface of my soup

Ah, lemme get my black marker.
The marker is applied to the customer's eyes
There. Censored in accordance with the Rules.

Waiter, there's an unlockable thread in my soup.

Sorry, the moderators are sleeping, they have lives too!

Waiter! There's a snake in my soup!

You ordered snake souWAIT ITS SUPPOSED TO BE DEAD AAAAAAAAAAA

Waiter, there's phosphorus in my soup!

You wanted it hot, no?

 

waitoror, there's a moonwalking Michael Jackson on my soup

Actually, why is it called moonwalk?

Waiter, there's a headcannon in my soup!

It's not headcannon, it's acne.

Waiter, there's somebody's stomach around my soup!

It's your stomach...

Waiter! There's an uninspired soup joke in my soup!

Keep calm and don't panic, the hazmat squad should arrive soon!

Waiter, there's liquid nitrogen in my soup!

Your Soupsicle™, you mean?

Waiter! My soup is magnetic!

You're soup is just attractive.

Waiter! There's a fraggle in my soup!

Fraggle can't be without rock as proven here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KLQS6xo40kI

Waiter, there this song in my soup:

Congratulations! You've just created a souposphere.

Waiter! The fly is topologically in my soup, though it looks flying around.

Meh, lemme get the Amplified Precursor Bomb out. It should remove the fly. And the constellation we are in.

Waiter! There is a Orz *Germinating* in my soup!

Yes, well, it should add an interesting salty flavour

WAITER THERE IS A DALEK IN MY SOUP HELP

yes, and i am one of them!

waiter! there is a exoplanet in my soup!

Oh wow! Does it have life?

Waiter! There is soup in my soup!

Good. It's supposed to be that way.

Waiter, their's a human hand in my soup

Its here to give you a hand at eating your soup.

Waiter! My soup is -300 degrees Celsius! I dont even think that is normally possible!

why no, it most certainly is not

Waiter! my soup is just shampoo!

It'll clean the cilia in your throat.

Waiter, there's an @StupidAndy in my soup

*leans in* That's a crouton, sir. Why did you mix your soup and your salad?

Waiter, there's an orphaned prime in my soup! (the one that looks like -> ' )

Edited November 16, 2016 by 0111narwhalz

Im replacing it with a different type of Prime since you want a different one. I think a Metroid Prime fits well.

Waiter! There is Electromagnetic Noise in my soup!

It's called thermal radiation. It means your soup is properly cooked.

Waiter, my soup is absorbing all light. I'm not sure if there's a fly in it or not.

then run, its gravitational pull being stronger then light means that it is a black hole

waiter! there is some anti-matter in my soup!
